Service.Name: Barber's Services, full
Service.Description: A complete hairstyling for both your beard and head of hair.

Service.Name: Barber's Services, simple
Service.Description: A quick trim for your beard and/or head of hair to your liking.

Service.Name: Coach Cab (per mile)
Service.Description: A coach cab that will take you to your destination of choice. Charges per mile.

Service.Name: Grave Digger
Service.Description: A person who will dig a grave for either a future you or a fallen friend.

Service.Name: Hireling, trained (per day)
Service.Description: A skilled individual that will perform menial labor for you. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Hireling, untrained (per day)
Service.Description: An unskilled individual that will perform menial labor for you. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Inn Stay (Common) per day
Service.Description: A one night stay at the local Inn, which is of decent quality. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Inn Stay (Good) per day
Service.Description: A one night stay at the local Inn, which is of good quality. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Inn Stay (Poor) per day
Service.Description: A one night stay at the local Inn, which is of poor quality. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Massage, Therapeutic
Service.Description: A massage that is designed to enhance your health and well-being.

Service.Name: Meals (Common) per day
Service.Description: Enough meals of decent quality to last you a full day. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Meals (Good) per day
Service.Description: Enough meals of good quality to last you a full day. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Meals (Poor) per day
Service.Description: Enough meals of poor quality to last you a full day. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Messenger (per mile)
Service.Description: A person who will deliver a message for you. Charges per mile.

Service.Name: Midwife
Service.Description: A person who will help your wife or friend during childbirth.

Service.Name: Mourner
Service.Description: A person who will attend a funeral for either your friend or you if you are that desperate for someone to show up.

Service.Name: Nanny (per day)
Service.Description: A person, typically a woman, that will care for your child in your own home while you are gone. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Nanny (per day), noble
Service.Description: A noble person, typically a woman, that will care for your child in your own home while you are gone. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Road or Gate Toll
Service.Description: A road or gate that you must pay to use.

Service.Name: Ship's Passage (per mile)
Service.Description: A narrow way through which your ship may pass...for a price. Charges per mile.

Service.Name: Soft Cheese
Service.Description: Some soft, edible cheese for sale.

Service.Name: Stained Glass Work (per sq ft), common
Service.Description: Typical stained glass construction, installation, and maintenance. Charges per square feet.

Service.Name: Stained Glass Work (per sq ft), fancy
Service.Description: Fancy, high quality stained glass construction, installation, and maintenance. Charges per square feet.

Service.Name: Tutor (per day)
Service.Description: A private teacher who will educate you on any subject that you desire. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Tutor (per day), noble
Service.Description: A private, noble teacher who will educate you on any subject that you desire. Charges per day.

Service.Name: Undertaker
Service.Description: A person who will prepare dead bodies for burial or cremation and make arrangements for funerals.
